name: "Pure Heat"
description: A heavy dark bronze metal water kettle. Beneath its simple exterior is excellent performance brought about by excellent material and shape. Even if placed atop a charcoal fire for an entire week, this kettle will experience no serious warping, and will not pose any safety concerns. As such, caf√© staff can just use this sort of kettle and never worry about heating water, which allows them to focus all their energies on improving the quality of their coffee.
